price: Зар божанства која они од земље праве могу да оживе мртве?!
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
